headline: Willis appoints Stephen Kyriacou Head of Litigation and Contingent Risk Solutions in North America
summary: NEW YORK, Feb. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Willis, a WTW business (Nasdaq: WTW), announced today that Stephen Kyriacou has been appointed Head of Litigation and Contingent Risk Solutions, and Senior Director of Transactional Solutions for North America. In this role, Kyriacou will develop and implement specialized insurance solutions for litigation and contingent risks, working closely with corporate, private equity, law firm, hedge fund, and litigation finance clients to design products that a

headline: WTW net income doubles to $1.25bn in Q4 2024
summary: The company reported a net loss of $88m (£70.15m) in 2024, compared with net income of $1.1bn in 2023.
